summary: All 8 UI component files exist and match the spec. All component interfaces match spec definitions. TypeScript compilation passes. Components have proper TypeScript types, accessibility features, and are properly exported from index.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: All components have proper TypeScript types

acceptance_criteria.reason: Components include data-testid, aria attributes, role, focus rings, motion-reduce support
All variants and sizes implemented per spec

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Components are properly exported from index
acceptance_criteria.reason: index.ts exports all 7 components and Props types
